NQG framework.from sentence: Our NQG framework outperforms the PCFG - Trans and s 2s + att baselines by a large margin .

NQG ++.from sentence: The extended version , NQG ++ , has 1.11 BLEU score gain over NQG + , which shows that initializing with pre-trained word vectors and sharing them between encoder and decoder help learn better word representation .

With the help of.from sentence: With the help of copy mechanism , NQG + has a 2.05 BLEU improvement since it solves the rare words problem .
